page.title: 05WORK PLACES IN EASTRIGGS
page.content: There are about 40 sources of full time employment in Eastriggs, apart from the 12 farms and smallholdings in the block. Many of the 40 are one person businesses, but some employ several people. The work places include: Ordnance depot; Lemonade factory; 2 boiler repair firms; peat works; light engineering firm; scrap merchant; diary; agricultural engr; garage; 3 motor mechanics; minibus service; joiner & undertaker; hairdresser; Chinese restaurant; cafe; 2 pubs; social club; shops; boarding kennels; library; school. There are also various self_employed tradesmen (painter, builder, plumber, etc.) and some women work as home helps. Some men work part time as Solway salmon fishers, either with hand held haaf_nets, or tending fixed ranges of stake nets.
